website_summaries.verdict: A durable, versatile USB-C adapter that provides high-fidelity results.
pros: Features a built-in DAC chip for the highest-quality 24bit/96Khz sound
It's built to last with a nylon jacket cord and reinforcement points on either end
The USB-C connection offers wide compatibility with a variety of devices
cons: Some users note that the adapter comes unplugged easily

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding DAC!
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would give this DAC equipped headphone jack 10 stars! This dongle sounds better then my desktop DAC. I have been testing all day on Amazon Music, YouTube music and IDAGIO. No matter the genre I play, the music is clear, clean - the sound is AMAZING. I can not say enough about this dongle and it's included DAC. I use this dongle between my Samsung Note 10+ and my audio-technica reference headphones. Hats off the the engineers who designed this! The fit into the phone is outstanding, very tight and secure!
customer_reviews.author: D. Conger

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are solid!
customer_reviews.text: So I needed to buy yet another one of these because you know, everyone wants to get rid of one of the most important inputs on a mobile device! Anyway, this one in comparison to the cheaper ones that fail after about a month and the OG cable that came with my Pixel 3 XL is night and day. The DAC/amp built in is much brighter and cleaner sounding as well as more powerful! I just hope this thing lasts more than a month or two. If so I am buying another one of these for sure as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Kish

customer_reviews.title: When it works it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Samsung S20+ and when it works, it sounds amazing. Problem is it randomly cuts out and stops working to the point where its unusable to even get trough one song sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding DAC
customer_reviews.text: I'm still annoyed that this product needs to exist, but, with that said, this is an outstanding USB-C digital audio converter (DAC). Sound quality on a Samsung Note 10+ was crystal clear, with no artifacting or distortion. The cable itself is braided and reinforced with rubber at either end, giving it added durability. The bright red also makes it easy to find in my gear bag. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Villines

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very pricey. Look well made. Fits snug on macbook pro. Allows me to get 24bit/96Khz from Amazon unlimited music to my Denon receiver using and 3mm to RCA analogue connection
customer_reviews.author: yadayada

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: After getting my Samsung Note 10+ I needed a USB-C to stereo Headphone Jack so I could listen to music on my Bose noise-canceling headphones. I have used JSAUX's other USB products and had a good experience so I decided to try their USB C to 3.5mm Adapter. I tested the headphones with the USB-C adapter and found that the quality was perfect. Great little product - works as advertized.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I like my Pixel 4 XL so much better now since I can use my old headphones and I can play my music from my phone in my car because of this adapter. Cheap ones from eBay did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, looks very nice, and a its good price. My new Note10+ doesn't have a headphone jack, which was nearly a deal breaker! This little adapter solved the problem, so no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Rtrogrl

customer_reviews.title: Added microphone capability to my laptop
customer_reviews.text: My laptop has a crappy headphone-out with no mic capability so I needed something to add microphone-in capability so I could use a gaming headset for teleconferencing and distance learning. Windows 10 set it up quickly and it worked perfectly, no drivers needed.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hester

customer_reviews.title: Pauses Music Randomly
customer_reviews.text: Even though stated, this did not work with my software up-to-date Samsung S20. It randomly and continually would pause my music without any input or movement from me. This made the adapters useless and ultimately (and sadly) had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Galaxy note 9 and I thought my jack was going bad but turns out it was my aux cable. Let me just I'm glad I'm bought this though! It has a lot more fidelity in the audio than your standard headphone jack. It you wanna really listen to quality music then you need one of these!
customer_reviews.author: shaneomac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adapter to listen to music and calls on my Samsung Galaxy Note 10+. I mostly use Bose noise cancelling headphones. The sound quality is excellent; I detect no sound degradation from this adapter. The connectors have a firm fit which adds a quality feel. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: very poor audio some times won't work
customer_reviews.text: disappointed in this product. the audio is very poor, breaks up or pops in and out. some times both earbuds work sometime not. the earbud controls don't work at all through this adapter. I bought three and none of them have worked well consistently. still try to use them some of the time. but mostly just bought the right kind of earbuds instead (can get earbuds that work for about the same price anyway)
customer_reviews.author: McRosta

customer_reviews.title: Compatible for telephone usage!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this was going to work with my Panasonic corded headset for my Samsung note 10 plus cell phone but I took the plunge and ordered it and to my surprise it did work! The call clarity is outstanding, very well made adapter cord. Many talk about this working so well for listening to music but not much said about actual phone call usage and I can attest that it absolutely works with superb clarity. I have the phone charger that is compatible with my Samsung note 10 plus phone and that is also outstanding quality with a very rapid charge. Love this brand and will keep on purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: dsybloss37

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a little over a month.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little finicky at the beginning with needing to be plugged in maybe 2 or 3 times before it would register. Sound quality was great and it worked as intended. Now, it doesn't register when you plug it in. If I *slowly* pull on the cord, it eventually makes a connection. Any movement on the cord from this point breaks this connection, making this effectively broken after a month of intermittent use.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Steward

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as input adapter
customer_reviews.text: This device does not work as an input adapter. I wanted something that allowed me to send audio from a 3.5mm cable into a newer Mac that has no separate audio input jack. This appears to work only as an adapter for a signal going from USB-C to 3.5mm (like headphones).
customer_reviews.author: CJB66

customer_reviews.title: New phone missing a headphone jack?
customer_reviews.text: If you're reading this, chances are that you got a new phone or are looking at new phone that will require something like this. All the major cell phone companies are removing the 3.5mm plug. So now you are forced to upgrade to USB-C headphones or Bluetooth. I don't know about ya'll but I prefer corded headphones. This product works great. I does what it's supposed to do and it doesn't look half either. Another great thing about this product is that you're not giving your cellphone manufacturer the satisfaction of buying there $30+ version of this (Samsung and Google). This product works on the Galaxy S20 and Google Pixel 4.
customer_reviews.author: CharlestonGeek

customer_reviews.title: Beast!
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a beast. It’s longer than my converter I got from Google for my Pixel 2 but obnoxiously. It feels reinforced and sturdy. I only received it a couple weeks ago so I can’t vouch for it’s lasting ability. One thing I wasn’t prepared for was the sound quality. It’s great. It sounds so much more clear than my old converter. Surprised me when I first gave it a try. I tried it with my old converter and you can hear a clear difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes N.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: didn't even work after I removed it from the package (edit) it has also taken them more than two weeks to return my money. still haven't gotten it back yet
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: I did not get what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the USBC to 3.5mm headphone jack connector, like what is pictured, and I, instead, got a 6 foot USB A to USB B printer cable (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This audio adapter sounds even than some of the DAC (some are active powered) I have. I am able to hear some background sounds I have never heard before. Of my 11 year shopping on Amazon, I have never come across such a satisfactory purchase. It is definitely the most amazing usb c audio DAC out there.
customer_reviews.author: FalkenX

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for audio. Only issue is that i needed it for an external mic.I tried to connect an external mic but I couldn't get it to work. I'm still trying to work through if this is an issue with my mic and why. Even without an adapter it would not work consistently with the headphones jack on multiple devices. If you have a better mic it may work for you which is why I still give it 5 stars. The build is solid.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH GALAXY S20
customer_reviews.text: AS STATED IN IN DESCRIPTION IT STATES THIS CAN BE USED ON THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S20. RECEIVED THIS ADAPTER CORD TODAY AND WENT TO TRY IT AND IT DID NOT FIT INTO THE SLOT. VERY FRUSTRATED! I BOUGHT MY 1ST ONE LAST WEEK AND DID NOT READ AND THOUGHT IT WOULD WORK AND RETURNED THAT TO GET THIS WHICH STATED IT WOULD WORK ON THE S20 HOWEVER IT DOES NOT. IT WILL BE GOING TO UPS TODAY!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Mind-blowing...
customer_reviews.text: I went through the set up of my bluetooth Sony headphones with my Note 10+ with this device and could not believe the sound I heard. With Dolby Atmos and this device, it was mind-blowing. I could hear every detail clearly and the bass was just right, no matter the type of music I tested. It is a rather short plug but it does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Romann T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks high quality and performs just as well as it looks. I like the headphones that came with my phone alright, I guess. They have a USB-C connection. That may be convenient, but I can't stand that I'm limited to that one pair of headphones. I have other favorite headphones and a couple more pairs around the house. Every time I want to quickly throw some headphones in my ears to listed to something privately, I seem to always be around a traditional style set of headphones, so this product was needed to give me back the freedom I didn't realize that I would miss with a phone that was void of a traditional headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Felton

customer_reviews.title: Good for $2...
customer_reviews.text: This wire was doing exactly what I wanted for the first 3-4 months. But now I can't get it to play audio through both of my ear buds (have tested my budd on multiple devices, worked perfectly fine) unless I twist the cable in specific directions. Not only that, but the USB-C fits very lose, almost as if it's not USB-C. This causes the audio of my phone to just shut off as it believes the wire got entirely disconnected, but realistically it's just a cheap knock off wire adapter. I will never be buying any products from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built cable that does the job
customer_reviews.text: My previous cable broke because it was a thin rubber cable. This cable is built much better, having a metal housing and a braided cable. It feels nice, isn't too heavy or too light, and works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Liu

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use my phone to process credit cards for my Pure Romance business and this was a lifesaver! I had broken my Samsung Note 5 and replaced it with the Note 20. After arriving to my party (work), I went to process a client's credit card only to realize I no longer had a phone jack!! I had to process each credit card by HAND. Not easy for someone who's dyslexic! Lol. My son researched the solution and ordered this for me. I'm now ordering another one so that I can keep one in my briefcase and my desk. I won't get caught without my credit card swiper again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Adapter and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adapter because when I plugged my speakers into the audio jack on my Asus laptop, the built-in microphone stopped working. My wife teaches school from home and needs the microphone for her Zoom sessions but doesn't want to hear everyone from tinny laptop speakers. This adapter allows me to bypass the audio jack completely (thus not impacting the microphone) and still get sound out of the connected speakers. This product is built well and most importantly, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: It's great! Not sure my phone loves it though...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described--it feels sturdy and durable so far. I got it to connect the aux cord in my car with my phone's USB-C port--the only thing I've noticed is that my phone sometimes freaks out when I plug it in. As in, my phone tries to open the Bixby voice command app and starts skipping songs/changing the volume. When this happens, I unplug the adapter and close all apps before trying again. I'm pretty sure that's an issue with my phone (Galaxy S20) recognizing the USB-C audio input and not a problem with the adapter itself.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Sound great! In-line volume didn’t work. Mute did.
customer_reviews.text: The audio sounds great and I can pause from my in line headphone control. Unfortunately the volume control doesn’t do anything. Just for those who are thinking of this to purchase with those kind of controls on your in-line headphones.
customer_reviews.author: mflybrigge

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy. But suddenly stopped working after 5 months. Update: Contacted customer service and they immediately sent me a new one because warranty is 18-month. New one works fine. Keep in mind you are paying for an 18 month warranty, not the actual jack itself. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ✨🌼

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week.
customer_reviews.text: When this thing worked it was great. The sound quality was fantastic. But beware. In less than a week it just stopped working. Thankful I could send it back but I'm never buying this product again. (For the record it was not heavily used and wasn't abused at all in the ONE week that I had it. Just normal headphone stuff. 1 hour or so at the end of the day when doing dishes stored in my headphone case when not in use. Very normal wear and tear. There is no reason why it should have failed. Shame on you JSAUX
customer_reviews.author: Y Kantor

customer_reviews.title: Useless-Cuts out
customer_reviews.text: Since I got a S20 which does not have an ear bud jack, I didn't want to have to get rid of my wired Bose earbuds. I got this thinking it would be a decent solution. At first they seemed to do well. After a couple of months they started cutting in and out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CDL&JEL

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than wireless ear buds
customer_reviews.text: A dongle may not be elegant, but it beats shelling out a couple of hundred for wireless buds you'd use a couple of times before losing one or tearing it out of your ear because it was so annoying. I haven't tested how well it works with a microphone. The sound quality when privately listening to books, movies, and music depends on the quality of your wired ear phones. Plan on listening for long stretches or want great sound/noise deadening? Use headphones.
customer_reviews.author: mllecheree

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a Pixel 4 and prefer to use wired earphones rather than Bluetooth. This collector is worth its weight in gold! I tried to other less expensive connectors and there was always static. This one is amazing so if you're trying to figure out the best USB c to 3.5 mm Jack this one is great. No connection issues, no static.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwheel5

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds quality!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my husband and I were skeptical about it working since we do not trust many items online due to the fact that it could be cheap, but this item has worked perfectly so far and the sound quality is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Karoline B.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, a little bit quiet compared to the onboard amp of a Galaxy S10+
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as my headphones don't fit well through the case I use. Compared to the built-in headphone jack, the sound quality is just as good, so no complaints there, and the build quality of the cable itself is solid. One star knocked off due to the max volume being lower than what you can get from the built-in system. It's not a huge difference, in that it won't be an issue for most listening levels and phone calls, but for workout music or just stuff you like loud, it's a little wanting. For $12, I'm happy enough with it, though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other adapters before from amazon and none of them have worked, so my expectations were low for this one. My original dongle from Google broke and this was cheaper than buying one from the Google store. It works super well!! I love cables that are braided like this because of their durability. My music sounds great using this cable and it's a lot longer than I expected too. Probably will buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The adapter cover comes off!
customer_reviews.text: I am looking forward to its arrival. When I receive it, it looks good, but when I use it, I just plug it in and listen to the song for a while. When I unplug it, this phenomenon occurs: the adapter cover comes off, the durability of the item is questionable. I was teased by my friend. I don't think it's worth it. So disappointed! I would not recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rubén

customer_reviews.title: Bad connections
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the ones I received were junk, but it loses connection and is very fuzzy on all different types of headphones. Aggravating when it keeps making your music pause. Edit. : the replacement was junk as well. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to the One Plus 7T Pro 5G McLaren Edition just to find out it lacked a headphone jack. So I got this, and honestly it's been pretty fantastic. Doesn't fall out, stays in place, good sound quality, etc. Worth the money and keeps my working out without any issues or loss of music and podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to replace your favorite earphones or headphones, this is a great option to connect them to your phone that has the USB type C connection. I love them and it has great quality! Totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A1ru1k0n9

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months.  Same as the value ones.
customer_reviews.text: Great connector. Only lasted 2 months. Same life expectancy as the value connectors. Normal use, music, games, audiobooks. Started cracking and cutting out yesterday and for the price I'm really disappointed. I thought I bought a good one so it would last longer but it turns out it lasts just as long as the value 3 for 1 deals you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Solberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time dongle user and I love my music and was very concerned about the quality of the music in my car when I hooked it up with this dongle. Worries are gone. The sound quality is the same as before, if not a tick better. The color is beautiful (I bought blue). The quality feels great. Definitely recommend to anyone who is as picky with sound quality as me.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Does the unnecessary job.
customer_reviews.text: In a world where some nob head decided to get rid of the aux port on media devices, and disrupt an industry standard so now we have to make sure our watches, phone, and headphones are charges every night. This does the job of making it so you don't have to spend 100s of dollars on new headphones or unreliable bluetooth, even 5.0 can lag, disconnect, run out of battery charge. THIS I HOPE NEVER DIES. Cables are more convenient in some cases.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer "Tom"

customer_reviews.title: Best adapter out there
customer_reviews.text: Thus is my third adapter I have purchased since acquiring my Samsung Note 10+. The first two were garbage that I put up with because I thought these adapters were all basically the same. I was wrong. This one is stellar! I don't need to turn up the volume near as loud now and the sound clarity is so much better. I wish I had bought this adapter the first or second time. I plan to buy another so I can leave one in my car and the other at work. If you are in the market for an adapter, do yourself a favor and purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have an assortment of headsets with 3.5mm plugs. Just got a new phone that provides audio only through Bluetooth or the USB-C port. I've never been a fan of Bluetooth for so many reasons (sound quality, cost, connection issues). Haven't done test for music, but at least for voice, this adapter works great. I'll probably buy a couple extras.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flich Redham

customer_reviews.title: OK for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Have used for 3 weeks now. Worked fairly well first week (I have samsung s20 ultra) and use corded earbuds for signing. Notice static even with slightest movement and had times where sound/music completely goes away until I unplug and replug the dongle. Guessing this is an issue with most usb-C adapters as I hope one day there will be a device that has no lag/delay and the sound quality through the adapter is at least 85-90% of wired earbuds quality for music and mic pickups when double was not needed with 3.5 mm plug
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: I can finally use my headphones x'D
customer_reviews.text: The connection type on the nightowl carbon hates most everything being a TRRS tip type. So the fact I can actually use both of its intended functions on my phone is awesome. And since the cable has already outlived two days, it's already passed the longevity of the other ones I tried over the last three years ._. .... I don't know how long it'll last, but that'll be a fun experiment :P.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built, it served the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built*, item served the purpose: earphone listening to audio (muisc etc); Communication between a device and my pixel XL 4 (with type-c USB) for 3.5 earphone port. *Listening and feeling the click when you plug in the 3.5mm (comparing with other kind of cables), the smoothness indicates the built quality.
customer_reviews.author: Musica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome for a 1 1/2 months. Now it continuously disconnects. What an absolute shame. All my connections are tight BUT it constantly acts like I unplugged it. Quite bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What it's Suppose To.
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged it into my S20+ 5G edition and it works exactly as it's supposed to. When I unplug it from my phone my music pauses, and resumes if I plug it back into my phone. Does a great job making your latest and greatest flagship phone be compatible with the most widespread audio jack form factor. Works great and exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't make a popup on my sony xperia
customer_reviews.text: I got the Apple branded adapter to replace my Sony one whenever it gave up the ghost, and boy did it disappoint. Only lasted for about 3 months, and the entire time it would make a popup appear on my Android phone when plugged in (my fault I suppose for choosing the Apple one instead of an Android one). I hope these last longer.
customer_reviews.author: JobMcKee

customer_reviews.title: Works well with OnePlus 7
customer_reviews.text: Tried one of the cheaper ones but unfortunately that one worked only after increasing the volume to a particular level. Below that it was sketchy. But this one works very well right from the lowest volume all the way up. Good sound quality. Do note that this not for making phone calls, it's only for audio from the phone. The only con is it's high price.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I needed it to. I have the note 10+, which doesn't have the headphone jack. I needed this to use with the square credit card reader and it works. Haven't used it for phone calls or music yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cory G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't work for Samsung note 10+.
customer_reviews.text: My phone is a Samsung Note 10plus. When I plug in headphones there is too much loud static and noise to have a phone conversation. I no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Whitescarver

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: When I got it my headphones didn't connect fully so I thought I had a dud. I tried it on another pair and realized, I just need to push it in a little more to hear an audible click. They sound amazing on both my Bose Sport Sound wired headphones and my Sennheisers. Best product for my Pixel 4 and other usb c products.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: mostly junk
customer_reviews.text: Technically it kinda/mostly works, but it cuts in and out causing the phone to switch back and forth between the attached headset and the internal speaker. Very annoying when in use. It's cheap, but in this case you get what you pay for and that isn't much. Save your money and buy a real usb-c headset.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this with my new S20 Ultra and Bose noise cancelling headphones but the adapter wouldn't stay connected and I was constantly fooling with it to push it back in to the headphones and phone. It would be fine to just sit on a plane and not move but not for my walks. Unfortunately I will be returning this and trying to find one that works better with my devices. On a positive, love the blue color!
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Bar none, best adapter!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these adapters and found much to be desired until I got this one. No crackling noises when I move, amazing sound quality and a sturdy cord. The cheaper options barely save 5 bucks, definitely just buy this one and be done with it!
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Works As Intended
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Longer then another brand I purchased. The "Hi-Fi audio" thing they write on it is just marketing, I hear no difference between this adapter compared to another one that is a few dollars cheaper. I only purchased this because I misplaced (then found) another branded one I have. Nice material and simply works.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Barr

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Here is my initial impression: Nice appearance, good build quality and good sound. My cellphone still has a headphone jack but using this dongle improves the audio quality. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works on Nintendo Switch Lite in Portable Mode
customer_reviews.text: Purchased solely to use with Nintendo Switch Lite in portable mode while using the flip cover, as when the cover is closed the 3.5mm jack is blocked while only the usb C port is exposed. For this purpose the device works great. Was not easy to figure out but it appears that audio is only transmitted through the Nintendo Switch USB C port when used with usb class 1 DACs (max 24bit/96Khz) for which this device is listed.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: So necessary!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty necessary piece to have at the moment, with all these new phones not having a headphone jack. It feels like great quality, it'll definitely last and is easy to carry around with me. I do feel like it colors the sounds a bit, things can be a little louder and definitely more bass heavy. That can be great for using in the car or just throwing on some music, but not great when you're used to a particular sound from your favorite pair of headphones. All in all, still a good product
customer_reviews.author: Mat C.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID-19, I have been working from home for several months now. I need to use this adapter to make my headset work with my phone. It sees heavy use 5 days a week, as my job keeps me on thr phone for most of the day. The sound quality and durability of the product have been great!
customer_reviews.author: I.R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Tried using with my practically out of the box s20 ultra in my car and the audio completely stops if the adapter jiggles even the tiniest bit, leaving me with no choice but to try and fix it while driving if I want music back. Not only would I say this adapter is a bad product, but in my circumstance it's became a hazard. Maybe its just the one I received, but I would still not recommend if there's this low of quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these from Google, which were a bit cheaper and did great. This was a pretty good second choice but a little more expensive. No issues with sound quality in the car on a note 10 when paired with an Amazon Basics 3.5mm male to male cord, so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: DrumBum

customer_reviews.title: Major GO Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really working great with my oneplus7t pro mclalen. I wasn't expecting too much because it's USB -C connection, but the sound was really great even better than some 3.5mm Aux cable. This is great to connect with both my headphones and car stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael

customer_reviews.title: Works great on our Pixel 4 and Pixel 4 XL
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these, one for each of our phones, and they work as advertised. These are the second batch of adapters we bought (first ones were a different brand and different seller); the USB-C connector on the previous ones didn't hold at all in the phone, but these are as snug as a bug on a rug.
customer_reviews.author: dano

customer_reviews.title: The solution to the disappearance of the headphone jack.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've only had it for a month but it sounds good. The solution to the disappearance of the headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Es Ar

customer_reviews.title: Well made and does precisely what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be able to use older headphones with my Galaxy S20 and this small adapter lets me do that. It does exactly what it's supposed to do. Seems well made. I don't know what Sheerness is but my not knowing didn't seem to be a reason to cost it anything in the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a while but then it started to get static and would stop playing music unless I held it just right then it stopped working completely. I ended up buying the Samsung brand adapter which is definitely worth the price. I have no issues with the Samsung one.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee Kann

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This worked okay for about a month and then it started shorting out. I typically use it in my car plugged into my phone and leave my phone resting in the center console area. Any bump or bit of movement causes it to lose connection and you have to wiggle it around or plug it back in to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Noe

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Sound is great, so far no interference, allows me to use my existing speakers to listen to my music without headphones on my new phone that eliminated the headphone jack (grrrr! I wish phone makers would stop being stupid! Bluetooth is not always best!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying a higher dollar cable meant higher quality but boy was I wrong. I've just started using it regularly are if i pick up my phone the wrong way it cuts my music off.
customer_reviews.author: Elana

customer_reviews.title: won't work with a mic
customer_reviews.text: Edit* Although this product didn't work well for me, the company was very helpful. They offered a lot of help. If it turns out mine was defective, and a new one works, I will give this 5 stars... Bought to use with a headset, the mic won't work through it. Its a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Worked with s20 ultra for lavalier mic
customer_reviews.text: After trying three different adapters to get my Galaxy s20 Ultra to work with a 3.5 jacked lavalier mic, this adapter worked.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: 2 months in and this adapter does not work at all. It is now impossible to keep a connection between my Samsung Ultra 20 and brand new 'old school' ear buds. I'm not a fan of Bluetooth. I bought this specifically because newer phones are ridding of the typical headphone port. I'm uber disappointed. This disconnect started happening a few weeks ago and has now permanently disallowed me to listen to and take calls with my very nice wired ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Hill

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out way too much
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Note 20 because I have a set of really nice wired Sony noise canceling headphones that I did not want to get rid of. Unfortunately it is not living up to what I expected. It cuts out... A LOT on walks or any type of movement. This is extremely unfortunate. I was hoping for something as good as just plugging into a 3.5mm jack but will have to go a different route. When it works it does sound great it's just a shame it's so sensitive to movement.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Libera

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Galaxy S20+
customer_reviews.text: The adapter looks good, but when plugged into the S20+ and a 3.5mm headphones, there's no sound in the headphones, but the speaker on the S20+ delivers the sound. In other words, the adapter doesn't exist when connected to the S20+. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Devek Maga

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: A little more pricey than some of the other adapters but the quality is really good. Feels sturdy and very durable. The nylon material makes it much more durable unlike the rubber/plastic cables that tear easily over time.
customer_reviews.author: a2thaEye

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect when new, but then the week after the return window it started to mess up. It disconnects and forces the phone to auto pause. constantly. Very annoying and inconvenient. I replaced the 3.5mm cable I was using as well as tried it with different devices to figure out that is was this cable causing the issue. would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S20 -- perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you have an old car with an aux plug; the new Galaxy S20 only has the USB-C out and this works perfect to convert. Great sound as well, I expected some static or hiss and combined with a good cable, works great into my Harmon-Kardin or whatever it is in the car haha
customer_reviews.author: Mattiavelli

customer_reviews.title: Better than the samsung adapter
customer_reviews.text: i noticed the sound difference compared to the samsung adapter i have. This makes my earbuds sound better. Its not a huge difference, but good enough to satisfy. it did improve the midrange and highs on my earbuds. Volume controls and mic still wotk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My new Samsung phone didn't have a headphone jack. On my old phone I could play music on an old Pioneer stereo with a 3.5 jack to RCA stereo connection. With this Type C to 3.5mm connection, I can play music on my stereo using my phone again.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie E. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Tried with some headphones and there was no noise distortion or issues with volume. When plugging into the phone there is a satisfying click sound and when connecting to a 3.5mm jack it clicks as well. Feels like it is of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my S20 Ultra. However I wish the USB-C end sticking out of the bottom of the phone was shorter, and the price was less for such a small connector. And why couldn't they offer it in black to match most phones nowdays?
customer_reviews.author: SlickBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects at the slightest movement
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this to connect my headphone jack-less phone to my car's aux port. Worked for the first week, now it just continuously disconnects unless I'm going at a slow speed on a very new, very smooth road. It just cannot handle any vibration from highway driving (or any driving) on a typical road anymore. The USB-C port on my brand new phone is tight and sturdy, as is my aux cord. Didn't even get my money's worth
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Williams

customer_reviews.title: It totally works
customer_reviews.text: It effortlessly works. It's the simplest thing ever. It works with both audio and microphone. I wish I didn't need this device, but, if I am going to need this, this device definitely works and it's super affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Tough cord
customer_reviews.text: The quality is amazing. I just bought new Bose headphones for Christmas before purchasing my S20. The S20 no longer uses headphone jacks so I'm glad this product is so strong so I can use my Bose every day with my new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Great adapter
customer_reviews.text: These adapters are a godsend! My Pixel 3xl cane with great earbuds but they are too big for my ears. To use the regular earbuds, of which I have dozens, requires an C type adapter. This on is sleek & fits great. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: lorik4

customer_reviews.title: Great DAC Solution
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older model car without Bluetooth so, I needed this. I chose this one because its braided. I have yet to need to replace a braided data cable. Sound is crisp. And time will tell if I am right about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: OK

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Lost the dongle that came with my phone and this is a perfect replacement. I'm impressed with the overall quality of the product. No issues with playback on my headphones Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: I miss my headphone port.
customer_reviews.text: Tried the whole wireless earbud thing when my new phone came without a headphone port. I hated them and bought this instead so I could use my old wired earbuds. Very happy with this product and no concerns with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S

customer_reviews.title: Mic on headset wasn't working properly
customer_reviews.text: I mainly made this purchase to plug in my headset with mic and be able to use it for gaming but my friends were unable to hear me properly so it did not work as I was hoping. Will have to purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: fReinKo

customer_reviews.title: Great converter for newer phones
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that all my headphones no longer fit my new phone. This converter meant I didn't have to buy all new. Quick and easy to use. I might buy a few more so I don't get caught without.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Best adapter yet.
customer_reviews.text: This adapter works perfectly with my Samsung S20. I've purchased other adapters but this one worked best. Sound quality is definitely better. You get your monies worth for sure. No static feedback or cut off sound like the others.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but disconnects
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, but the USB-C end is a tiny bit loose. I'll be walking and it makes a clicking sound and stops the audio. Works best when I have it in with the logo side down.
customer_reviews.author: rusty

customer_reviews.title: Too quiet
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer noted, this adapter causes a noticeable reduction in volume compared to other adapters. I really wanted to like these, I'm bummed. Using a ZTE Axon 10 Pro and ATH-M50x's.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

product_meta.title: USB Type C to 3.5mm Female Headphone Jack Adapter, JSAUX USB C to Aux Audio Dongle Cable Cord Compatible with Pixel 4 3 2 XL, Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra Z Flip S20+ Note 10 S10 S9 Plus, iPad Pro(Grey)
feature_bullets: 【Wide Compatibility】: Wider compatibility than others type c to 3.5mm adapters, compatible with most of the type c phones: pixel 4 3 2 XL, Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra S20 Z Flip S20+ S10 S9 S8 Plus, Note 10 10+ 9 8, iPad pro,Huawei Mate 30 20 10 Pro, P30 P20, One plus 6T 7 7Pro and more.
【Multi-function Dongle】: This compact usb-c to aux adapter enable you to listen musics and answer phone call with your headphone and support wire control function as well.
【Hi-Fi Sound Quality】:This c to aux adapter is compatible with up to 24bit/96Khz while others are 16bit/48Khz, you can get higher fidelity sound from it.
【Relief Strain Design】:With the relief strain design, this adapter can stand 40000+ bending tests, which makes this adpter much more durable.
【What You Get】: We provide this usb c to 3.5mm adapter with 18-Month Warranty and friendly 24/7 customer service.
